definitions: (of a condition or injury) limiting a person's movements, senses, or activities
shortDefinitions: (of condition or injury) limiting person's movements, senses, or activities

definitions: having the effect of putting something out of action

examples.text: they are looking into building a disabling feature into new cars
your smartphone has a disabling device that makes it worthless to robbers

shortDefinitions: having the effect of putting something out of action
